profile.bio: I'm always open to learning, collaborating, and joining enthusiastic teams for hackathons or real-world projects. Let's connect and build something meaningful together!

about.heading: Software Developer | Full-Stack Explorer | Problem Solver | Lifelong Learner
about.aboutme:
I am a Computer Science student currently pursuing my master's degree at Saint Leo University.
 My journey in tech began with a simple love for problem-solving and logical thinking. This curiosity led me to dive deeper into data structures and algorithms, where I found a passion for writing efficient, optimized code. 
 As I built my foundation in DSA, I became increasingly interested in how software systems work end-to-end. This led me to explore full-stack development, starting with frontend technologies like HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, Bootstrap, and React. I then expanded into backend development using Java, Spring Boot, and Node.js, often applying microservices architecture to design scalable systems. Along the way, I gained hands-on experience with MySQL, PostgreSQL, and MongoDB. 
 I have actively participated in college hackathons, which have strengthened my ability to work under pressure, collaborate with diverse teams, and rapidly prototype innovative solutions. I am always open to joining new teams for hackathons to explore fresh ideas and expand my skills. 
 Let's connect!
